Title: Sinai Arabic 505. Martyrdoms and Lives of Saints ; Mimars ; Apophthegmata : manuscript, [13th c.]. St. Catherine's Monastery, Sinai, Egypt
Contents note: Mimars by SS. Gregory Nazienzis, Ephraem and John Chrysostom ; Life of St. Gregory of Sicily by Leontius ; Life of St. Stephan of the Monastery of St. Saba ; Martyrdom of St. Artemius, and of SS. Glaucus and Glycerius together with a group of women ; Epistles (7) of St. Ignatius ; Apophthegmata derived from the teachings of St. Moses the Black of Scetis, according to St. Cassian

Title: Sinai Arabic 597. Book of Daniel ; Salomon’s Proverbs : manuscript, 1002. St. Catherine's Monastery, Sinai, Egypt
Contents note: Old Codex written in ancient Naskhi with Kufic features. First 83 original folios contain the Book of Daniel and Salomon’s Proverbs. The rest, in different hand of later Naskhi, contains a historical treatise entitled “Book of the History of Years and Times” from the Creation to the Truce between the Fatimids of Egypt and the Byzantines
